content.rendered:
The First Digital Currency You Can Mine on Your Phone

35Million+

Engaged Pioneers

scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->

20,000+

Testnet Nodes in Operation

scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->

230+

Countries & Regions

scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->

35Million+

Engaged Pioneers

scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->

230+

Countries & Regions

scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->

Mining crypto is hard.

Investing in crypto is risky.

Too many of us are left out of the cryptocurrency revolution…

Keep your money! Mining Pi is free. All you need is an invitation from an existing trusted member on the network. If you have an invitation you can download the mobile app below.
scl-shortcode-cleaner-clean-content-end-->
